amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Community Development Block Grants by $396 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to return the funding level for the Community Development Fund to the FY 2012 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 267 (Roll no. 433).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chaffetz amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 267 (Roll no. 433).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Chaffetz.
